title: Fragment, late 19th–early 20th century
medium:
Medium; silk, cotton
Technique: woven velvet (supplementary pile in a satin foundation)
dimensions: Warp x Weft: 64 x 55 cm (25 3/16 x 21 5/8 in.)
description: Ornamental arrangment of flowers, leaves and scroll in oange, majenta and grren velvet on white satin background. both selvages present.
